import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; import './CoachProfile.css'; const CoachProfile = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return (

Coach Profile

Personal Information

{user?.name || 'Not provided'}
{user?.email || 'Not provided'}
{user?.sport || 'Not provided'}
{user?.experience || 'Not provided'} years

Qualifications

{user?.qualifications?.map((qual, index) => (
{qual}
)) ||

No qualifications added

}

Teams & Athletes

{user?.teams?.map((team, index) => (

{team.name}

{team.description}

)) ||

No teams assigned yet

}
); }; export default CoachProfile;
